short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for sending data to Discord webhooks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you copy text so you can manually send webhooks on discord from trading view easily for alerts , simply enter the text in the text field and click copy to clipboard and paste it in the alert text field.

You can also use our Get From Clipboard function, simply copy the text from trading view and click on the extension and click Get From Clipboard button

Once the text is copied, you can add the webhook for your alert and paste this in your text field.

The text you write or copy will be wrapped in a json code which will talk to discord on how to display your message.
